sensors
Class Sensor

java.lang.Object
  sensors.Sensor
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnalogSensor, BooleanSensor, IntegralSensor
public abstract class Sensor
extends java.lang.Object

A sensor supporting listeners, encapsulating much of the functionality of the sensors in the package, and should be extended to provide more kinds of sensors.

Author:
Colin Poler

Nested Class Summary
static class Sensor.SensorEvent
          A class that should be extended by each sensor type with an event for that sensor.
static interface Sensor.SensorListener
          An interface that should be extended by each sensor type to include a method they call with their events.
static class Sensor.Types
          A class (more closely resembles an enum) that describes the various types of sensors implemented so far.
 
Field Summary
 long sensorId
          The ID of the sensor.
 
Constructor Summary
Sensor(long sensorId)
          Constructs a new Sensor with the specified sensor ID.
 
Method Summary
 void addListener(Sensor.SensorListener listener)
          Adds a listener to the sensor.
 void removeListener(Sensor.SensorListener listener)
          Removes the listener from the sensor.
abstract  short type()
          Determines the type of the sensor.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Field Detail

sensorId

public final long sensorId
The ID of the sensor. It is used to identify sensors so that duplicates are not made.

Constructor Detail

Sensor

public Sensor(long sensorId)
Constructs a new Sensor with the specified sensor ID.

Parameters:
sensorId - The ID of the sensor.
Method Detail

addListener

public void addListener(Sensor.SensorListener listener)
Adds a listener to the sensor. The listener is checked to make sure it is valid (e.g. AnalogSensor ensures it is an AnalogSensorListener)

Parameters:
listener - The SensorListener to add.

removeListener

public void removeListener(Sensor.SensorListener listener)
Removes the listener from the sensor.

Parameters:
listener - The SensorListener to remove.

type

public abstract short type()
Determines the type of the sensor. It should just return a value from Sensor.Types, no funny business.

Returns:
The type of the sensor.
